Purpose: To measure CMV IgG avidity in order to differentiate recent primary infection from past CMV infection.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube for serum; EDTA, heparin, or citrate tube for plasma
Equipment: Microtiter plate reader, plate washer, 37 Â°C incubators, pipettes, vortex mixer, timer, centrifuge
